entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chipman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:17 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Gagetown 10:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -13.7°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries late in the evening and ending after midnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
